main.name: Pedro Ortega
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I'm passionate sofware engineer always looking to learn something new. I'm currently working at Wiaeline. My main interests are Machine Learning, Dev Ops and Full Stack development. I love to play sports, I enjoy videogames from time to time. I also love to travel.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: I'm currently working as a tech lead building microservices and integrations with third party systems with NodeJS, Sequelize, Docker for a project with one of Wizeline's customers.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Working as a full stack web developer. Using SQL for the backend, JAVA Jersey for the midtier/web services and javascript, jquery and ojet on the front-end.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Developing web/mobile applications using Angular, Node, MySQL and Ionic framework.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Working in the Sustaining Engineering team for Oracle Enterprise Manager. Resolve bugs through analysis, making PL/SQL scripts for analysis and Java code fixes.

work.title: Junior Web Developer
work.description: Developing a Content Manager System named PLUG, used to create intranet portals, using JavaScript, JQuery and SharePoint as backend. Also helping in secondary projects using ASP.NET and WCF Services.

work.description: Working in the Sustaining Engineering team for Oracle Enterprise Manager. Resolve bugs through analysis, making PL/SQL scripts for analysis and Java code fixes.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
